scenes.text:
We are the Cardiff Uni's mens rugby team! 

Are you ready to be part of a vibrant, dynamic, and highly competitive rugby community? Look no further than the Cardiff Men's Rugby Club. Boasting an impressive line-up of 7 teams, including 2 dedicated medical teams, we offer unparalleled opportunities for every player, regardless of your level of experience.

We have matches facing against many teams, competing in the BUCS Super Rugby league.

All members have access to our training facilities, coaching, as well as discounts at our social venues and reduced university gym membership.

We have regular rugby fixtures on Wednesdays, as well as socials on the same days after our games. 
Our training schedule is available on our SU page.

Every student who joins must buy a Macron Kit Pack which is available at our Macron store, as well as a membership, in which we have 3 different types.

Standard Membership: £75.00
IMG Membership: £30.00
Social Membership: £30.00

We hold weekly socials following games on a Wednesday at our regular venue. We also hold annual Christmas meals and End of Season Dinner Awards ceremonies. We have many types of socials all throughout the year.
